requirements.title: File-Based Task Lifecycle
requirements.description: Create, stage, execute, complete, and fail tasks using file-based storage (tasks/active, backlog, staged, completed, failed) with proper state transitions
requirements.validation_method: Tasks transition correctly between folders with proper metadata updates

requirements.title: Intelligent Priority Calculation
requirements.description: Calculate task priority using (Impact × Urgency × Success_Probability) / (Resource_Cost × Cooldown_Factor) formula with configurable weights
requirements.validation_method: Priority scores calculated correctly and tasks ordered by priority

requirements.title: CLI-Based Scenario Integration
requirements.description: Dispatch work to scenarios via CLI commands (ecosystem-manager, resource-experimenter, app-debugger) with proper error handling
requirements.validation_method: Dispatcher successfully calls scenario CLIs and captures results

requirements.title: Task Monitoring Dashboard
requirements.description: Trello-like dark theme UI showing tasks across active/backlog/staged/completed/failed columns with drag-and-drop
requirements.validation_method: UI displays tasks in kanban layout with functional drag-and-drop

requirements.title: Real-Time Agent Monitoring
requirements.description: Display what each agent is working on with live status updates via WebSocket or polling
requirements.validation_method: Agent monitor panel shows active tasks with real-time updates

requirements.title: Manual Task Creation
requirements.description: Allow humans to create priority tasks by dropping YAML files in tasks/backlog/manual/ directory
requirements.validation_method: YAML files in manual/ directory are parsed and tasks appear in backlog

requirements.title: Learning and Adaptation
requirements.description: Track success/failure rates and adjust priority weights based on actual vs predicted impact
requirements.validation_method: System adjusts weights after task completion and shows improved predictions

requirements.title: Pattern Recognition
requirements.description: Store successful task sequences and failure modes in Qdrant for future reference and pattern matching
requirements.validation_method: Patterns stored in Qdrant and retrieved for similar new tasks

requirements.title: Cooldown Management
requirements.description: Prevent thrashing on repeatedly failing tasks with exponential backoff
requirements.validation_method: Failed tasks have increasing cooldown periods before retry

requirements.title: Dependency Resolution
requirements.description: Execute tasks in correct order based on dependency chains with circular dependency detection
requirements.validation_method: Tasks with dependencies execute in correct order

requirements.title: PROBLEMS.md Scanning
requirements.description: Automatically discover and create tasks from PROBLEMS.md files across resources and scenarios every 5 minutes
requirements.validation_method: Problems in PROBLEMS.md automatically generate tasks with correct priority

requirements.title: YOLO Mode
requirements.description: Auto-approve AI-generated tasks when yolo_mode is enabled in configuration
requirements.validation_method: AI tasks auto-move to staged when yolo_mode=true

requirements.title: Distributed Tracing
requirements.description: Full execution tracing across multi-step task workflows for debugging and analysis

requirements.title: Mobile Monitoring App
requirements.description: iOS/Android app for task monitoring and approval on the go

requirements.title: Advanced Analytics
requirements.description: Success metrics, throughput charts, resource usage graphs, and learning rate visualization

requirements.title: Task Templates
requirements.description: Reusable task templates for common improvement patterns

requirements.title: Multi-Cluster Coordination
requirements.description: Coordinate work across multiple Vrooli installations for distributed environments
